data.name: Sucker Punch Demo
data.detailed_description:
Like Pong, in VR, on Steroids, with Superpowers! Sucker Punch VR is a fast-paced arcade punch-fest! Go head-to-head wielding a variety of powers, to punch, parry, and strike your way to victory! Score cubes past your opponent while preventing cubes from getting past you. Easy.....right?

Sucker Punch VR: Demo gives you free access to experience a taste of the action you can expect in the full Sucker Punch VR title!
data.about_the_game:
Like Pong, in VR, on Steroids, with Superpowers! Sucker Punch VR is a fast-paced arcade punch-fest! Go head-to-head wielding a variety of powers, to punch, parry, and strike your way to victory! Score cubes past your opponent while preventing cubes from getting past you. Easy.....right?

Sucker Punch VR: Demo gives you free access to experience a taste of the action you can expect in the full Sucker Punch VR title!
data.short_description: Sucker Punch - Demo: is a fast-paced first-person VR game: one part sport, one part fighter. Wielding a variety of power-ups, you will punch, parry, and strike your way to victory launching a flurry of cubes at your opponent. Defend your goal while sending blocks past your foe to win!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i9
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
